p: In Equation (9), [η] represents the intrinsic viscosity (dL/g) of the polymers and polymer mixtures and K H is the Huggins parameter. For flexible polymer macromolecules, K H value usually lies between 0.2 and 0.8, and favorable polymer–solvent interactions occur. Particularly, if K H > 1, intermolecular association and entanglement are usually expected [ 40].
